431a2(mdo 'grel): pa la phal cher lha'i dbang bo dbang sgyur du 'gyur ro/ /lta ba log ba rnams 'dod na ting nge 'dzin la sogs pa bye ba khri phrag 'bum du 'gyur ro/ /brgyad pa la phal cher stong spyi phud kyi bdag po tshangs pa mthu stobs chen bo thob bar 'gyur ro/ /'dod na ting nge 'dzin la sogs
431a3(mdo 'grel): pa stong phrag gsum 'bum phrag bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed du 'gyur ro/ /dgu po la phal cher stong gnyis pa'i bdag por 'gyur te/ 'dod na ting nge 'dzin la sogs pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa 'bum phrag bcu tshang ba'i rdul phra
431a4(mdo 'grel): rab kyi rdul snyed du 'gyur ro/ /sa bcu pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni phal cher dbang sgyur pa'a? sa la gnas ba tshangs pa/ pa 'thob bo/ /de la ting nge 'dzin dri ma med ba zhes bya ba mngon du 'gyur te/ de mngon du gyur ma thag tu stong
431a5(mdo 'grel): gsum 'bum phrag bcu dang chos kyi dbyings rnam par dbye ba la 'jug pa zhes bya ba dang/ byang chub kyi snying po'i tshogs can dang/ da ltar gyi sangs rgyas mdo gong ma de'i nang du/ na sum du zhugs ba zhes bya ba mngon du 'gyur te/ de la sogs
431a6(mdo 'grel): pa'i sangs rgyas ma 'das pa'i dgongs gi ting nge 'dzin grangs med ba 'buM phrag bcu mngon du 'gyur ro/ /'das pa'i sangs rgyas kyi dgongs ba nas/ tha ma la tha ma ma 'ongs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi dgongs ba/ kyi dgongs ge sa cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang khyad par med pa'i dbang bskur tha mi dad bar 'gyur ba'o/ /
431a7(mdo 'grel): ba dang ldan ba zhes bya ba ye shes /mdor du 'gyur te/ de mngon du gyur ma thag tu stong gsum la sangs rgyas rnam dang dgongs pa gcig tsam ma bum phrag bcu dang mnyam pa'i rin po che thams cad kyis spras bas rna? dbang na ba thams cad nub nas lo ga gyi yul
431b1(mdo 'grel): thams cad las 'das pa/ log las 'das pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad las byung ba/ nor ba rin bo che baiDUrya yu ba can/ can ngan gyi rgyal po mtshungs pa med pa'i snying bo can/ rdo rje snying po'i ze ba can/
431b2(mdo 'grel): stong gsum gyi rdul phra rab dag pa'i snang ba 'di ltar/ kyi grangs dang mnyam snang ba ci 'dra bar 'gyur na/ pa'i pad+ma'i gdan la sdod par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' i lus kyang de dang mtshungs bar 'gyur
431b3(mdo 'grel): ro/ /dus der sa thams cad g.yo bar 'gyur ro/ /ngan song thams cad rgyun chad par 'gyur ro/ /spyod pa 'thun pa'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad der 'du bar 'gyur ro/ /de'i
431b4(mdo 'grel): dus su sku'i sta zur dang / dpung pa g.yas g.yon la sogs pa nas kyang 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig la sogs pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /'di dag ni de dag yongs su smin pa'i mdor bsdus pa'i don
431b5(mdo 'grel): tsam du bstan pa'o/ /rgyas par ni mngon par rtogs pa'i rgyan dang/ sa bcu pa'i mdo dang/ dbu ma la 'jug pa la sogs pa'i bstan bcos nas gzugs sku'i 'phrin las/ shes bar bya'o /
431b6(mdo 'grel): ` sa bcu bo 'di la'ang dang po ste rtog pa la mkhas pa dang/ gnyis pa ste 'thob pa la mkhas pa dang/ gsum pa ste 'phel ba la mkhas pa dang/ bzhi pa ste mi nyams pa la mkhas
431b7(mdo 'grel): pa dang/ re ro/ mkhas ba lta ste/ lnga ba ste mthar thug par 'gro ba las mkhas pa'o/ /rtog pa la mkhas pa ni mi mthun pa'i phyogs 'jig pa dang/ gnyen po skye ba la mkhas pa ste gnyen po'i phyogs gang zhe na
432a1(mdo 'grel): sa phyogs mi mthun pa bcu'i gnyen po ye shes bcu'o/ /'thob pa la mkhas ba ni sa la 'jug pa la mkhas ba dang/ sa la zhugs pa dang/ sa'i khyad par gang? du?
432a2(mdo 'grel): 'phel pa la mkhas pa ni gzhan du 'phel sbyob ba dang/ sa'i khyad par gang du sa 'og ma bas ye shes gong ma cha? 'phel pa'i sa de nyid la gnas pa dang/ gang bcugs bsgom pa dang/ gang 'og gi/ sa gong ma
432a3(mdo 'grel): 'og ma nas gong mar/ 'phel ba'i khyad bar la mkhas pa'o/ /sa yongs su mi nyams pa la mkhas pa ni theg ba chen po sa dma' bar mi 'gro zhing/ phyir mi ldog pa la mkhas pa'o/ /la zhugs nas/
432a4(mdo 'grel): mthar thug pa la mkhas ba ni/ byang chub sems dpa' i sa mthar phyin nas de bzhin gshegs gong ma nas 'og mar mi 'gro bas/ ba'i sa la 'jug ba la mkhas pa'o/ /chos le'u bcu'i 'bras bu 'di lta ??
432a5(mdo 'grel): de rnam rab grogs ni sa thams cad kyi gdam ngag du shes bcu bar bya'o/ /da ltar sa bcu la gnas ba'i byang chub sems dpa' ni chos thams cad kyi dbang phyug du gyur pas de bzhin gshegs pa nyid ces bya ste/
432a6(mdo 'grel): yang dag bar rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni ma yin no/ /` 'o na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su gang gis 'gyur zhes 'gam? la gnas ba'i byang sems la ltos nas/ na/ sa bcu ba'i chos nyid spros pa
432a7(mdo 'grel): sangs rgyas la ltos nas/ dang bral ba bzhin du / phan yon gyi le'u dang/ sdig ba bshags pa'i le'u dang/ sems yongs su bzung ba'i le'u dang/ bag yod pa'i le'u dang/ shes bzhin gyi le'u dang/
432b1(mdo 'grel): bzod pa'i le'u dang/ brtson 'grus kyi le'u dang brgyad kyis yon tan rnams gzugs skur rdzogs/ bsam gtan gyi le'u dang/ shes rab kyi le'u gnyis kyis chos skur rdzogs so/ /de'ang ji ltar rdzogs na sa bcu ba'i
432b2(mdo 'grel): byang chub sems dpa' des chos kyi dbyings gsal la mi rtog pa'i dang du le'u brgyad kyi don/ sbyor ba'i lam dang/ bar chad med pa'i lam dang/ rnam par grol ba'i lam dang/ rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong
432b3(mdo 'grel): ba'i lam du sgom te/ sbyor ba'i lam ni le'u brgyad po'i don gzugs sku thob par bya ba'i phyir sgom par sbyor ba'o/ /bar chad med pa'i lam ni de ltar brtsams pa de gang gis kyang bar mchod pa sgom pa'o/ /rnam
432b4(mdo 'grel): par grol ba'i lam ni/ log gyi rtog pa dang bral nas gzhan don du gzugs sku'i nus pa thogs pa med /nam kun/ ba dang ldan pa'o/ /rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i lam ni/ ba dmar med pa'i rtse mo/ gzugs
432b5(mdo 'grel): skus rin po tsha'am/ dpag bsam gyi shing ltar rtog pa med bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' la longs sku dang/ nyan rang ma ? skad cig cig la byang chub pa/ chang la sprul sku'o/ /yang byang chub sems dpa' sa bcu ba des
432b6(mdo 'grel): chos sku gsal la mi rtog ba'i dang nyid du le'u gnyis kyi don sbyor ba'i lam dang/ bar chad med pa'i lam dang/ rnam par grol ba'i lam dang/ rnam par 'byung ba sangs rgyas kyis rdzogs pa/ grol ba'i ye shes
432b7(mdo 'grel): mthong ba'i lam du sgom ste/ sbyor bsam gtan shes/ ba'i lam ni le'u gnyis kyi don chos sku thob par bya ba'i phyir sgom pa sbyor ba'o/ rnam kun/ /bar chad med pa'i lam ni/ de ltar rtsams ba'i sbyor ba
433a1(mdo 'grel): de gang gis kyang bar mchod par sgom ba'o/ /rnam par grol ba'i lam ni/ shes rab le'u nas/ stong nyid bag chags goms pas na/ /dngos po'i bag chags spong 'gyur zhing/ /
433a2(mdo 'grel): ces gsungs bas na/ tshu rol mthong ba'i mtshan ma thams cad bar chad med ba'i rtse mo/ nga spong zhing /chos sku'i rgyu nus ba thogs pa med pa dang ldan pa'o/ /rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i lam ni/ chos kyi sku
433a3(mdo 'grel): de ye shes rgyun chad pa'o/ /ye shes rgyun chad pa'i go ba ni chos sku'i gnas skabs na ye shes de dngos por med kyang/ dngos med duAng med ba/ skad cig ma/ gnyis gar yang mi 'dod/ mdor na 'khor ba rtog bcas
433a4(mdo 'grel): kyi shes ba'i rgyun sangs rgyas kyis/ 'dis nyams su myong rgyu gcig mi 'dod /gzugs rtag par lta ba ltar/ nga 'dzin tshad mar lta ba ltar/ gyi rnam par rtog pa thams cad phang spangs nas/ da ltar gyi/ dmigs pa med pa
433a5(mdo 'grel): de nyid la rab tu zhi ba zhes bya/ chos kyi sku zhes bya/ de'i phyir na/ gang tshe dngos dang dngos med dag /blo'i mdun ma gnas pa/ /de tshe rnam pa gzhan med pas/ /dmigs ba med par rab tu zhi/ /
433a6(mdo 'grel): zhes gsungs pas so/ /yang ye shes rgyun chad pa'i go ba ni/ slob dpon blo gros mi bzang pas 'phags pa 'jam dpal la dris pa'i dus su 'ang/ 'phags pa lags/ da ltar gyi shes pa rtog
433a7(mdo 'grel): ba dang bcas ba'i rgyun 'dis sangs rgyas kyi ye shes la legs par dpyod dam/ ye shes tsam yang mi dmigs zhes dris pas/ don dam blo'i spyod yul min/ blo dang sgra ni kun rdzob yin/ /zhes
433b1(mdo 'grel): gsungs nas da ltar gyi shes ba'i rgyun 'dis nyams su myong ba ma yin gsung ngo/ /slob dpon gyis dris pa/ don dam pa de blo'i yul du mi 'gyur na ji ltar nyams su myong zhe na/ tshu rol mthong ba'i ngos nas btsal bas nyams su myong ba
433b2(mdo 'grel): mang pa nyid do// ci ste na rnam grangs kyi don dam pa'i bden pa bshad ce na/ nang stong pa nyid dang/ phyi stong pa nyid dang/ phyi nang stong pa nyid dang/ stong ba nyid stong pa nyid dang/ chen po stong ba nyid la sogs pa bshad pas/
433b3(mdo 'grel): 'o na tshu rol mthong ba'i rnam grangs rnams stong pa yin la/ don dam pa'i bden pa bya ba nges des bo gcig las logs na yod dam snyam pa la/ don dam pa stong pa nyid ces gsungs pas/ don dam du rtog pa tsam
433b4(mdo 'grel): dang bral bar bzhed bas na/ mdor na tshu rol mthong ba'i rtog pa thams cad nub pas/ sems can dang de'i don bya rgyu la sogs pa dang yang bral bas na ye shes rgyun chad zhes bya'o/ /` 'o na ye shes rgyun cha /'i ye shes /da
433b5(mdo 'grel): nas 'gro don gyi rtog pa'ang med na gzugs sku gnyis kyang mi 'byung bar rigs so zhe na/ so so'i las dang skal ba ji ltar yod pa/ byang chub sems dpa' dang/ nyan rang dang/ so so'i skye bo la/ sogs pa la rtog ba
433b6(mdo 'grel): med bzhin du snang ste/ yid bzhin nor bu dpag bsam shing/ /ji ltar re ba yongs skong ba /de bzhin gdul bya'i smon lam gyis/ /dbang gis rgyal ba'i skur snang ngo/ /ces gsungs so/ /ni ye shes
433b7(mdo 'grel): 'od nang du rang na la sogs pa dang 'dra na/ /bsod nams kun gyi snang ba yin pas na nor du la sogs ba ni rtog pa med sangs rgyas kyi byin rlabs med na/ /sems can dang nyan ring dang byang chub sems dpa' so'i bsod nams kyi skabS?
434a1(mdo 'grel): par 'dug go zhe na/ ma yin te dper na tshu dang ba la zla ba'i gzugs brnyan shar pa'i dus su chu med na zla ba 'char ba med na zla ba med na bar chu nang du 'char rgyu med/ dpe de bzhin du chu dang 'dra ba'i byang chub sems
434a2(mdo 'grel): dpa' la sogs pa med na'ang gzug bsod nams ma la sogs ba ni snang ba med bas na'o/ sa sku'i 'chang sa med/ zla ba dang 'dra ba'i sangs rgyas med na'ang gzugs sku 'byung rgyu med/ de bas na de ltar rtog pa med kyang slob pa
434a3(mdo 'grel): lam gyis bsdus pa'i gnas skabs na/ spyod pa thams cad yul sems la dmigs nas bsgrubs pas rtog pa med bzhin du gzugs sku 'byung ste/ dbang sngon gyi smon lam gyi mthu btsan pa las grub ste/
434a4(mdo 'grel): dper na bram ze 'jam bas sngon nam mkha' lding gi sku brten gzhan la phan pa'i bsam pas bsgrubs pas/ sngon gyi smon lam gyi/ de ltar bram ze bsgrub mkhan sngon 'das te phan par bya ba'i rtog ba med kyang phan pa bzhin du/
434a5(mdo 'grel): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la da ltar rtag pa mi mnga' 'ang/ sngon gyi smon lam gyi mthus gzugs kyi skus 'gro ba'i don byang chub sems dpa' la sogs pa'i bsam pa dang 'thun par byed
434a6(mdo 'grel): pas so/ /de bas na gnyis ka 'joms pa gal chel /'i ye shes/ 'di yang dag pa'i dper bshad pas na/ dper na nam mkha' lding gi ni/ /mchod sdod sgrubs nas 'das 'gyur pa/ /de 'das yun
434a7(mdo 'grel): rin po tshe la sogs pa ni rtog pa med ba tsam gyis ma yin no/ rengs lom pa des/ /dug la sogs pa zhi byed bzhin/ /byang chub spyod par rjes 'thun pas/ /rgyal a'i mchod spong bsgrub pa yang/ /byang chub
434b1(mdo 'grel): sems dpa' mya ngan las/ /'das kyang don rnams thams cad mdzad/ /ces gsungs so/ /'dir dris ba/ /spyod 'jug le'u bcu po'i don bsgoms te/ tshogs lam chung 'breng gi skabs su bsgom par rigs te/ spong?
434b2(mdo 'grel): lam nas sangs rgyas kyi sa'i bar du le'u bcu po'i gdam ngag gis go tshong par mi rigs te ce kre ste na le'u bcu po de mod kyang gcig la don yang gcig par/ de ltar gyi nyon mongs pa dang de'i gnyen po bshad nas 'dug bas so/ 'dug pas
434b3(mdo 'grel): so le'u bcu po des sangs rgyas kyi sa man chad gdams par byed do zhe na/ le'u ming mi gcig la den mi gcig par re 'ong bar rigs so zhe na/ /de'i lan du 'gal ba med/ dper na khang la thog bcu dgu pa
434b4(mdo 'grel): gcig yod do zhe la/ de'i nang na yang rim pa bzhin du 'og na dmyal ba/ de nas yi dags/ dud 'gro dang/ mi dang/ lha ma yin dang/ lha la'ang rgyal chen rigs bzhi dang/ sum cu rtsa
434b5(mdo 'grel): gsum dang/ dga' ldan dang/ /'phrul dga' la sogs pa yod do zhe na/ mar me thogs pa gcig gis phyin pas dmyal ba la sogs pa de gang khyed khyed mar me gcig pu ma 'gyur ba des gsal bar byed do/ /dpe
434b6(mdo 'grel): gi bzhin du spyod 'jug le'u bcu po'i ming dang don gcig pa ma 'gyur ba de rang gis tshogs lam nas sangs rgyas kyi bar du gong nas gong du gsal zhing smin par byed do/ /de bas na/ yan lag 'di dag thams cad ni/ /
434b7(mdo 'grel): thub pas shes rab don du gsungs/ /ces pas na/ yan lag 'di dag ni le'u bcu po yin la/ shes rab ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas so/ /thub pa ni?
435a1(mdo 'grel): */ ni sangs rgyas te rgyu sems can las 'bras bu sangs rgyas thob pa'i thabs su 'dug ba'o/ /yang dper na chu gcig pu la rten gyi stobs kyis/ dmyal bas khro tshu rol man?
435a2(mdo 'grel): yi dags kyis snag khrag / mis chu/ lhas bdud rtsa ri mthong ba dang 'dra bar/ byang chub sems dpa' tshogs lam pas spyod 'jug gi le'u bcu po de tshogs lam ba'i grogs dang thabs su mthong/ de
435a3(mdo 'grel): bzhin du sbyor lam pa dang/ sa bcu po dang/ sangs rgyas kyi bar du grogs dang thabs su mthong ste/ rtogs pas khyad par du byas/ tshig tshogs kyi ming dang don gyis khyad bar du ma byas te/
435a4(mdo 'grel): dper na byang chub sems dpa' rtag tu du la/ byang chub sems dpa' chos 'phags kyis/ chos thams cad sna tshogs ba nyid pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sna tshogs ba nyid do/ /rgya
435a5(mdo 'grel): mtsho mu med pa nyid bas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med ba nyid do/ /zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs pas ting nge 'dzin mang bo skyes nas 'dug go /rang cag gis tshigs tshogs de mthong ste ting nge 'dzin skye'am
435a6(mdo 'grel): de bas gong nas gong du 'grod pa'i thabs mi 'dra ba med do/ /spyod 'jug gi le'u bcu po 'di rang gis go chod gsung ngo/ /yang dper na lha sbyin dang/ mchod sbyin dang/ gang bo dang/ ma 'gags pa la
435a7(mdo 'grel): sogs ba mi mang po gcig la rta spyi ma gcig yod do zhe na/ rta de lha sbyin gyis zhon ba'i dus su lha sbyin gyi rta/ mchod sbyin gyis zhon pa'i dus su mchod sbyin gyi rta zer ba la sogs pa bzhin du/ rta dang
435b1(mdo 'grel): 'dra ba'i spyod pa la 'jug pa le'u bcu po 'di/ mi mang bo lha sbyin la sogs pa dang 'dra ba'i tshogs lam gyi dus su tshogs/ bgrod pa/ thabs/ de bzhin du sbyor lam dang/ sa bcu dang/ sangs rgyas pa'i bar gyi
435b2(mdo 'grel): spyod pa la 'jug pa le'u bcu po de grogs/ bgrod pa thabs su shes par bya'o/ /spyod 'jug 'khor lo lta bu'i lam rgyud la skye ba'i rim pa lan bcu dgur 'khor ba ti ba ka ra shi jnya? nas mdzad pa'o/ /
435b3(mdo 'grel): rdzogs so// //` spyod 'jug spyi rta chen mo 'di/ /zhon pa mang ste chags pa nyung/ /la las rnar snyan sgrub du bshad/ /la las gzhung
435b4(mdo 'grel): bshad khral bor tsam/ /la las dkar chad nag gi bshad/ /shan te de pa'i dgongs ba 'khrugs/ /dgos pa chung la bshad ba mang/ /'gro ba kun la phan pa chung//
435b5(mdo 'grel): ` 'jam mgon byams pa'i thugs dgongs te/ /shan ta de bas rgyas btab 'dra/ /dge slong e la d+ha ri dang/ /de bzhin dpa' bo rdo rje dang/ /tshe grub ma hA rang na dang/ /gser gling g+hu ru pha la dang/ /mar
435b6(mdo 'grel): me mdzad dpal chen po dang/ /gung thang nag tsho lo tsha dang drang srong shes rab chen po'i bar/ /brgyud pa'i lta spyod rnams dag la/ /deng sang bdag kyang mos pa spyod// //
435b7(mdo 'grel): gro?/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i don bsdus sgron ma bzhugs// //rgya gar skad du/ pradz+nyA pA ra mi ti pa na twa da tha pra dI baM/ bod skad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i don bsdus sgron ma bcom ldan 'das na zhes
436a1(mdo 'grel): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dus gsum rgyal ba bskyed pa'i yum/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la// /phyag 'tshal nas ni shes rab kyi/ /pha rol /
436a2(mdo 'grel): phyin pa'i bsdus don bshad/ /mngon rtogs rnam pa bzhi yin te/ /mkhyen pa gsum dang chos sku la/ /mngon sum rtogs pas mngon rtogs te/ /sbyor ba bzhi ni mngon phyogs yin/ /'phags pa thogs
436a3(mdo 'grel): med de ltar bzhed/ /rnam par grol sde'i gzhung gis ni/ /mngon rtogs rnam pa bzhi yin te/ / / /sbyor ba bzhi po kho na ste/ /mkhyen pa gsum dang chos sku ni/
436a4(mdo 'grel): yul dang 'bras bu dag tu 'dod/ /gser gling shAn+ti rnam gnyis kyi/ /mngon rtogs bdag nyid bdun yang ste/ /shes rab pha rol phyin dag 'dod/ /'bras bu chos sku mdzad pa yin/ /brgyad
436a5(mdo 'grel): ka mngon rtogs seng bzang dang/ /bud+d+ha sh+rI dz+nya na'ang bzhin/ /mngon rtogs shes rgyud rim pa ste/ /dngos po brgyad ni brjod bya la/ /skabs ni rjod byed shAn+ti gsung/ /kha cig skabs brgyad dag
436a6(mdo 'grel): gis ni/ /gang dag brgyad kyi cha rkyen zhes/ /kha cig thams cad mkhyen pa dang/ /byang chub sems dang nyan thos kyi/ /gsum gyi lam du bstan to zhes/ /seng ge bzang po'i gzhung gis ni/ /thaMs cad mkhyen pa'i lam du ni/ /gnyis
436a7(mdo 'grel): ka tshad bar 'dod pa yin/ /de ltar min na ma rdzogs zer/ /bla ma gser gling bzhed pa yis/ /'ga' zhig yul na 'jug pa na/ /gzhi ma ma dag sa dag tu/ /gang zag brgyad kyil du 'dod/ /ma dag dag par byed dus su/ /gang zags su gyi la du 'dod/ /dag pa laM du byed su
436b1(mdo 'grel): su gang zag gcig gi lam yin gsung/ /de las bsdus don bshad pa ni/ /grangs nges go rim zlos spongs/ /rang rang ngo bo bshad pa'o/ /grang nges dag ni bstan pa nas/ /thos bsam yul du kun mkhyen gsum/ /sgom ?
436b2(mdo 'grel): dus su sbyor ba bzhi/ /'bras bu mthar thug pa chos kyi sku/ /thos bsam dus su 'bras bu dang/ /rgyu dang mi mthun phyogs dag tu/ /gtan la lab pa rdzogs pa yin/ /sgom pa'i dus su sbyor ba dang/ /gnas skabs 'bras bu bstan

441b5(mdo 'grel): gtso bor bstan pa ni/ /slob dpon bud ? sh+rI gsung/ /sbyor ba rnam bcur bstan kyang ni/ /grangs nges go rim nges pa med/ /sbyor yul bzhi yin sbyor ba dngos/ /gsum yin gnyis 'bras gsungs/ /zlos skyon sngar spangs ngo bo ni/ /rjes
441b6(mdo 'grel): pa yod/ /mthong lam na yod kha cig zer/ /sgom lam sbyor bzer ba 'ang yod/ /la la sbyor lam na yod de/ /sbyor lam ma bstan gsung ba ni/ /bzhi ru ma bstan la dgongs gsungs/ /zlos skyon sngar spangs ngo bo ni/ rjes
441b7(mdo 'grel): kyi lhag mthong snying rje yin/ /rlom med rnam bzhi bstan pa yang/ /seng bzang 'dod pa dkyus nas gsal/ /gzugs la gzugs kyis gzugs su dang/ /bdag gi rlom sems mi byed pa/ /rnam grol shin ? rnam gnyis
442a1(mdo 'grel): bzhed/ /sa mtshams sbyor bzhi ngo bo ni/ /shes rab yin te bcu bo yi/ /re re la yang bzhi bzhi yi/ /rnam yod zhes pa slob dpon ni/ /shes rab 'byung gnas blo gros zer/ /mthong dam bsdus
442a2(mdo 'grel): don sngar bshad do/ /'di ru bshad pa'i khyad par ni/ /bzhi pa skye ba'i tshul dang ni/ /thun mong ma yin tshul gyis su/ /bstan to zhes ni brjod pa yod/ /dod ba'i tshul nas bstan to zhes/ /seng ge bzang po de skad gsung/ /sgom laM
442a3(mdo 'grel): mi ston rgyu mtshan ni/ /sngar bstan zin te sbyor lam ni/ /byang sems thams cad mkhyen la bltos/ /nyan thos lam shes su bstan to/ /rnam kun mngon rdzogs yul gyis gnyis/ /shes dang shes byed rnam gnyis so//
442a4(mdo 'grel): yang na shes pa'i rgyud then pa/ /rnam kun shes bya blang ba'i rim/ /rten dang rten pa 'bras dang lnga/ /shes bya rnam pa brgya dang ni/ /bdun cu rtsa gsum bstan pa yi/ /grangs la nges yod ma yin yang/ /mkhyen pa gsuM
442a5(mdo 'grel): la brten nas ni/ /re zhig de tsam zhig brjod do/ /go rim skye ba'i rim pa ste/ /sa mtshams lam lnga gang na yod/ /cis shes slob dpon seng bzang gis/ /ye shes tshogs ni nyi shu yang/ /lam ni lnga kar sbyar bas so//
442a6(mdo 'grel): ngo bo 'dod pa mi mthun te/ /rnal 'byor rgyud la skye ba dang/ /bden bzhi'i rnam pa yin zhes dang/ /nyan thos byang sems sangs rgyas kyi/ /ye shes yin zhes 'dod pa gsum/ /rnam par rgyas dang mkhyen par
442a7(mdo 'grel): bsdus/ /yang na gtan la dbab pa dang/ /skye ba'i rim bas bstan pas na//zlos pa'i skyon dang bral ba yin/ /nyams len mnyam par bzhag pa dang/ /rjes kyi dus su nyams len no/ /mnyam gzhag sbyor ba
442b1(mdo 'grel): nyi shu ste/ /de yi yon tan bcu bzhi'o/ /bzhi bcu rtsa drug sbyor ba'i skyon/ /sbyor ba'i mtshan yid dgu bcu gcig /sbyor ba'i ngo bo zhi gnas dang/ /shes rab yin te zlos pa'i skyon/ /med de sbyor ba rnam bcu ru/ /rjes kyi cha nas 'di ru na/
442b2(mdo 'grel): mnyam bzhag cha nas bstan pas so/ /don la zlos sbyir mtshan nyid do/ /dang po gnyis ni sbyor ba dngos/ /gsum ni ba 'bras yin yang na yul/ /bco lnga sa mtshams sgo nas te/ /rgyu mtshan des ni nyi shu'o/ /kha cig sa mtshams
442b3(mdo 'grel): 'di ltar 'dod/ /lnga ni kun na gcig gis tshogs/ /lung bstan sbyor lam phyir mi ldog/ sa bdun man chad nges 'byung nas/ /gsum ni brgyad nas sa bcu'i bar/ /gzhin don yan chad sangs rgyas sa/ /? la de las gzhan du
442b4(mdo 'grel): 'dod/ /yon tan sa mtshams des med de/ /mdo las kun la yod par snang/ /sbyor ba'i phan yon yin bas su/ /sbyor ba'i rjes la 'byung ba'o/ /grangs nges med de ngo bo ni/ /phyin ci ma log phan yon no/ /skyon spangs sa mtshamS
442b5(mdo 'grel): nges pa med/ /spyir nas brgyad man chad du/ /skyon 'byung zhes ni mdo las bshad/ /de tshe spangs nas sgom zhes zer/ /la la sgom pa nor las zer/ /mdor na skyon dang yon tan ni/ /shes par byas nas sgom pa yin/ /mchan
442b6(mdo 'grel): nyid dgu bcu rtsa gcig kyang/ /grangs des med kyang 'khor gyi dong/ /de tsam kho na bshad pa yin/ /go rim skye ba'i rim pa ste/ /skye ba 'ang rags pa kho na skye/ /sa mtshams sbyor ba'i rjes na ste/ /mnyam bzhag
442b7(mdo 'grel): dus na'ang 'dod pa yid/ /mtshan nyid rdzogs pa sangs rgyas pa/ /cha mthun da lta'i gnas skabs nas/ /'di ni sbyor ba'i mtshan nyid/ /rnam pa zer ba yod kyang de/ /gzhung nas snga ma gsal bar bshad/ /mtshan nyid la
443a1(mdo 'grel): yang mi mthun te/ /thun mong ma yin mtshan nyid dang/ /gtan tshigs dag la 'dod pa'o/ /de yang sbyor ba skor gcig dang/ /so sor 'dod pa tha dad do/ /phyin ci ma log dpog pa dang/ /sbyor ba so
443a2(mdo 'grel): sor dpog pa yi/ /gtan tshigs dag kyang tha dad do/ /shes pa'i khyad par byed pa ni/ /'bras bu'i gtan tshigs ngo bo ni/ /rang bzhin gtan tshigs 'dod pa yod/ /shes rab 'byung gnas blo gros ni/ /khyad par dag kyang rang bzhin zer//
443a3(mdo 'grel): kha cig byed yin gzhan min zer/ /gsum ka gtan tshigs gcig tu ni/ /byed pa yod de mi 'thad do/ /sbyor ba dpags pa'i dgos pa ni/ /brtson 'grus cher ni 'jug pa dang/ /mthar gyis sgom pa'i mngon rtogs la/ /phan
443a4(mdo 'grel): zhes 'dod pa tha dad do/ /brjod ba mang ba de tsam mo/ /thar dang nges 'byed kyis mtshan nas/ /rjes la nyams su blang ba bshad/ /thar cha'i rten ni gling gsum mi/ /thos bsam pa yin ngo bo ni/ /dad la sogs pa rnam pa lnga//
443a5(mdo 'grel): shAn+tis dang sogs dbye bar byas/ /tshogs la mche 'bring rnam gsum du/ /seng ge bzang po'i dbye ba yin/ /mi skrag mi dang da mi zhum pa /che 'bring gsum gyi rtags su bshad/ /mya ngan 'das pa thar pa ste/ /de yi che ni sdug
443a6(mdo 'grel): bsngal bzod/ /de dang mthun pa nges pa yin/ /de nyid sbyin pa la sogs la/ /mi dmigs pas ni zin pa ste/ /thar pa'i cha mthun mtshan nyid yin/ /nges 'byed bsdus don lngar bshad kyang/ /rjes kyi nyams blangs 'ba' 
443a7(mdo 'grel): zhig bshad/ /dmigs pa sems can thams cad do/ /chung du'i rnam pa mnyam dang bya ba/ /'bring gi rnam pa phan pa dang/ /khong khro med dang mi 'tshe gsum/ /chung du'i rnam gnyis tshe 'di la/ /gzhan la 'tshe bar mi byed pa/ /
443b1(mdo 'grel): 'bring gi rnam gsum phyi ma la/ gzhan la phan par byed pa'o/ /chen po'i pha la sogs pa ste/ /'di dang phyi ma gnyis ka la/ /phan par byed pa kho na'o/ /rtse mo chung du'i mi dge las/ /ldog pa bdag spong bzhan 'jug la/ /'bring gi sbyin
443b2(mdo 'grel): sogs dge ba la/ /bdag dang gzhan dag sbyor ba ste/ /gzhan bde'i rgyud la sbyor ba'o/ /chen po'i bdag kyang stong sgom zhing/ /gzhan yang sbyor te gzhan dag la/ /phyin ci log ni spong bar 'dod/ /bzod pa chung du'i bden bzhi la/ /
443b3(mdo 'grel): bdag dang gzhan dag sbyor ba ste/ /gzhan ni 'phags lam sbyor 'dod pa'o/ /'bring gi rgyun zhugs la sogs lnga/ /shes shing mngon du mi byed la/ /bdag dang gzhan dag sbyor ba ste/ /gzhan dag 'bras bur sbyor 'dod ba'o/ /
443b4(mdo 'grel): chen po'i byang chub skyon med la/ /bdag gzhan sbyor de gzhan dag ni/ /sangs rgyas la ni sbyor 'dod pa'o/ /chos mchog chung du'i sems can ni/ /smin par byed de don la ni/ /theg pa gsum la dgong pa'o/ /'bring gi bdag gzhan
443b5(mdo 'grel): gnyis ka yang/ /byang chub mngon shes skye la ste/ /sems can byang chub lam sbyor ba'i/ /chen po'i bdag ni rnam mkhyen pa'i/ /ye shes skye bar 'dod bdag gzhan dag phun sum tshogs pa yi/ /mthar thug la ni 'jog pa'o//
443b6(mdo 'grel): tshogs lam rten ni bshad zin pas/ /nges 'byed mthong lam sgom lam gyi/ /phyir mi ldog pa'i gang zag gsum/ /bstan phyir rtags kyi sgo nas bshad/ /phyir mi ldog pa rnam gsum ste/ /'dir ni theg pa 'og ma ru//
443b7(mdo 'grel): phyir ldog ba yi rtags bshad do/ /dbang po rab 'bring tha ma yis/ /nges 'byed mthong lam sgom lam gyi/ /sa brgyad dag tu go rim bzhin/ /phyir mi ldog pa gsum yin no/ /mthar thug ldog ba yod pas na/ /rtag
444a1(mdo 'grel): yod na ni gnas skabs kyi/ /ldog pa yang ni med do zhes/ /rtags kyi sgo nas dpog ba yin/ /rang na dpag na rgyu tshogs pa'i/ /rang bzhin kho na'i gtan tshigs so/ /gzhan gyi dpog na rang bzhin
444a2(mdo 'grel): dang/ /'bru yi gtan tshigs gnyis kyis so/ /dpags pa'i dgos pa dang la ni/ /brnyas pa skyed pa dgag pa'o/ /de ni sbyi yi bye brag gi/ nges 'byed rtags ni nyi shu la/ /grangs res med kyang de tsam zhig/ 'khor gyi do ru bshad
444a3(mdo 'grel): pa yin/ /drod la bcu gcig rtse mo'i drug/ bzod pa gnyis te chs mchog gcig/ seng ge bzang po'i 'dod pa yin/ /shAn+ti sa de ltar ma phye'o/ /mthong lam rtags ni bcu drug kyang/ /rjes kyi cha nas rtags yin te//
444a4(mdo 'grel): 'o na bzod pa zer ba ni/ /sngar gyi nus pa mtshon pa yin/ /sgom lam rtags ni zab mo brgyad/ /kha cig pa ni re re la/ /brgyad ka yod kyang 'gal ba med/ /srid dang zhi mnyam rnam pa ste/ /gong gi gang zag de nyid kyis/ /rnam
444a5(mdo 'grel): pa 'di ltar bsgom zhes pa/ /slob dpon seng ge bzang po dang/ /bud+d+ha sh+rI dz+nyA na bzhed/ /sbyor ba nyi shu mi zlos te/ /rjes gyi cha nas bshad pa'o/ /nges 'byed cha mthun gyis mi zlos/ /'dir ni sgyu ma'i tshul nas so/ /rmi lam
444a6(mdo 'grel): chus khyer dper blangs nas/ /sa brgyad yan chad na yod ces/ /sangs rgyas phal bo chen sa bshad/ /srid dang zhi ba mnyam nyid kyis/ /mi slob rten bstan rnam grol gsung 'di tsam slob par byar yod ces/ /de skad rnam
444a7(mdo 'grel): grol gsungs pas nas/ /gtan mi slob pa'i mi slob min/ /zhing dag gnyis te sems can dang/ /snod kyi 'jig rten dag pa'o/ /sems can dag la bkres sogs dang/ /bral te theg gsum snod du rung/ /
444b1(mdo 'grel): snod dag snod sogs gser la sogs/ /seng bzang sangs rgyas sa ru 'dod/ /bud+d+ha sh+rI yang de bzhin no/ /dag par byed pa yin pas na/ /sa bcu man chad na yod zhes/ /'phags pa rnam par grol spe gsung/ /thabs la mkhas pa rnam
444b2(mdo 'grel): bcu yang/ /grangs des med kyang go rim ni/ /bskyed bya skyed pa'i rim ba dang/ /bsgrub bya gtan tshig rims pas ni/ /bstan zhes sangs rgyas ye shes gsung/ /sangs rgyas na na yod pas na/ /gzhan don thabs la mkhas pa ste/ /de
444b3(mdo 'grel): nyid kyis ni mtshan nyid yin/ /mdzad pas 'bras yin 'dir ni rgyu/ /des na de gnyis zlos pa med/ /seng bzang gsung ste rnam grol dang/ /bud+d+hA sh+rI rnam gnyis ni/ /sa bcu man chad na yod/ /thabs la mkhas pa'i ngo bo ni/ /sangs
444b4(mdo 'grel): rgyas rgyu la mkhas pa la/ /'dod pas sa mtshams mi mthun no/ /rtse mo bdun la drod kyi rtse/ /rtags kyis bstan te dbya ba ni/ /bcu gnyis bstan kyang grangs nges med/ /rtse mo rtags gnyis so so ste/ /rtags kyis rtse mo dpag
444b5(mdo 'grel): ces su/ /la la de skad 'dod pa yod/ /kha cig rtags nyid rtsa mo ru/ /'dod de rtags kyi dpag bya ni/ /phyir mi ldog par dpog pa ste/ /lung nas de ltar dpag go gsung/ /rnam 'phel bcu drug rtse mo yi/ /grangs nges med de
444b6(mdo 'grel): go rim kyang/ /med de 'dis kyang 'dis kyang ni/ /'phel lo zhes ni bya ba yin/ /bcu drug gang rung yod bsu/ /de yi rgyud la dge 'phel ba/ /rtse mo yin zhes la la zer/ /bcu drug nyid ni rtse mo zhes/ /kha cig de skad 'dod pa 'ang
444b7(mdo 'grel): yod/? sngar ni yod par ma gyur la/ /rtse mo thob nas yod pas na/ /'phel ba zhes ni brjod pa yin/ /bzod pa'i rtse mo kun mkhyen nyid/ /gsum gyi chos ni sems bskyed sogs/ /sngar bshad pa yi rim pa rnams/ /bzod
445a1(mdo 'grel): bar rdzogs par thad snyam na/ /spang bya gzhi shes rdzogs pa dang/ /lam shes rnam gnyis rdzogs pa dang/ /rnam kun bar du rdzogs pa la/ /rdzogs pa'i tha snyad btags zhes zer/ /rtse mo sa dgu
445a2(mdo 'grel): yan chad na/ /rdzogs par yod pas 'gal ba med/ /de skad kha cig rdzogs par byed/ /shAn+ti pa yi 'dod pas ni/ /kun mkhyen chos ni rnam gsum yang/ /rang byung dang ni de bzhin gshegs/ /thams cad mkhyen pa gsum la
445a3(mdo 'grel): 'dod/ /chos mchog rtse mo dpag med kyang/ /ting nge 'dzin la rten nas su/ /bsod nams dpag tu med pa ni/ /rtse mo ru ni bshad pa yin/ /mthong lam rtse mo spangs ba dang/ /rtogs dang yon tan rtse mo zhes/ /spangs sogs
445a4(mdo 'grel): zhar la byung ba ste/ /rtse mo dngos ni pha rol phyin/ /re re la yang drug drug tu/ /rdzogs pa yin zhes kha cig zer/ /des na mthong lam rtse mo ni/ /rjes kyi gnas skabs na yod zer/ /spangs bya rnam bar rtogspa ni/ /gzung
445a5(mdo 'grel): 'dzin gnyis su bsdus pa ste/ /zhib tu phye na re re la/ /yang ni dgu yod pa yin/ /khams gsum spangs byas phye na ni/ /rtog pa brgya rtsa brgyad yin no/ /grags nges rgyu mtshan yul gyis te/ /che 'bring gis kyang zer ba yod/ /
445a6(mdo 'grel): ngo bo 'khrul ba'i shes ba ste/ /rtog bcas rtog pa med pa yi/ /'khrul ba gnyis ka yin zhes zer/ /shes bya'i sgrib pa kho na ste/ /nyon mongs sgrib dang shes bya'i sgrib/ /la la gnyis char yin par 'dod/ /bdag yod
445a7(mdo 'grel): du ni rtog la sogs/ /dman pa'i rtogs pa yin pa dang/ /bdag med du ni rtog la sogs/ /dan rtog gi ni gnyen po dag/ yin zhes 'dod pa mi mthun no/ /la la gnyis char zer ba ste/ /'di 'grel na ni tha ma gsal ?
445b1(mdo 'grel): don rtog bskal pa dpag med nas/ /de yi gnyen po'i rtogs pa ni/ /'jig rten pa yi lam na yod/ /spong ba mthong lam bar chad med/ /theg pa chen po'i 'dod pa ste/ /nyan thos rnam grol lam gyis so/ /rgya mtsho la ni chu bo bzhin//
445b2(mdo 'grel): yon tan dpag med 'du ba ni/ /sgom pa lam gyi rtse mo ste/ /sa brgyad yan chad na yod zhes/ /la la 'dod de dpyad na ni/ /sa bcu'i gnas skabs na yod 'dra/ /spang bya rtog pa'i mtshan nyid ni/ /sngar bshad zin bas bye brag gis//
445b3(mdo 'grel): mtshan nyid bstan par bya ba ni/ /seng ge bzang po'i 'dod pas su/ /'byed par byed pa'i dus dag na/ /yod pa'i phra rtag yin zhes gsung/ /rnam par grol sde sgom lam gyi/ /rjes kyi shes pa'i gnas skabs kyis/ /dge ba zag bcas
445b4(mdo 'grel): yin zhes zer/ /bar chad med pa'i rtse mo ni/ /ngo bo zhi gnas lhag mthong ste/ /bar ni gang gis mchod la/ /yon tan rdzogs mang mtshan nyid yin/ /zlos pa'i skyon ni sngar sdangs te/ /sa mtshams rdo rje lta bu na/ /mnyam
445b5(mdo 'grel): gzhag 'ba' zhig yin pas na/ /'di yid dmigs pa dngos med yin/ /rang gi rgyud la log par rtog/ bcu drug bsal la skye ba ste/ /log par rtog pa'i ngo bo ni/ /nyon mongs shes bya'i sgrib pa ste/ /gnyis char zer
445b6(mdo 'grel): rte la la ni/ /tha ma kho na yin bar 'dod/ /grangs des med de sdud pa ru/ /log par sgrub pa'i ming gi su/ /mang du bshad par 'dug pas so/ /rgyas par 'dir ni spro mi bya/ /mthar gyis pha rol phyin pa drug/ rjes su dran drug don
445b7(mdo 'grel): ? mo/ /pha rol drug dang bsgrub pa yang/ /'chol dang go rim yin pas na/ /zlos skyon med dkon mchog gsum/ /de bzhin yin pas zlos skyon med/ /sbyin dang tshul khrims gnyis dang ni/ /gtod dang tshul khrims dran 
446a1(mdo 'grel): pa yang/ /dngos dang bral ba'i cha na su/ /bstan pas zlos skyon med pa yin/ /lha dang dkon mchog dbang po dang/ /rten tshul yin pas zlos ba med/ /skad cig byang chub rnam bzhi ni/ /ldos? pa
446a2(mdo 'grel): dpya ba yin bas su/ /rim gyis skye ba ma yin no/ /dad pa gnyis ni 'bras bu yin/ /tha ma gnyis ni rnam pa yis/ /grangs ngas? yod ba ma yin yang/ /'bras bu kun ni de ru 'dug/ sku ni gcig gnyis gsum bzhi lnga /
446a3(mdo 'grel): grangs ba nges 'dod pa dag tu'o/ /rang dang gzhan gyi don gyis su/ /sku gsum zhes ni byams pas gsungs/ /rang don chos sku gnyis po ni/ /rgyud dag ma dag rnam gnyis kyi/ /don du gzugs sku rnam gnyis zer/ /mdo sde thar la
446a4(mdo 'grel): chen po nas/ ngo bo nyid sku gsungS pa dang/ /don dam gyi ni bden pa dang/ /gsum po dag tu ma 'dus pas/ /sku bzhi zhes ni seng bzang gsung/ /sprul pa yis ni sprul la sogs/ /yod pas sku lnga gzhan dag zer/
446a5(mdo 'grel): bdag gzhan longs spyod rdzogs pas su/ /sku sngar 'dod pa don gsang yin/ /ngo bo nyid sku'i ngo bo ni/ /dngos po'i gnas lugs rtogs pa yi/ /ye shes yin no sku gnyis ni/ /gzugs la 'jog ste gzugs de yang/ /
446a6(mdo 'grel): 'khor gyi snang ba 'ga' zhig la/ /'jog pa thogs med mched kyi gzhung/ /gnyis ka'i snang ba la 'jog pa/ /phyogs kyi glang po la sogs pa/ /gnyis ka'i snang ba ma yin par/ /'dod pa nA gA rdzu na sogs/ ye shes
446a7(mdo 'grel): lnga ka chos sku ru/ /la la 'dod pa yod kyang ni/ /bud+d+hA sh+rI ni 'di ltar 'dod/ /me long ye shes chos kyi sku/ /mnyam nyid so sor rtog ba ni/ /longs spyod rdzogs sku sprul pa ni/ /bya ba grub pa'i ye shes yin //de ltar 'dod
446b1(mdo 'grel): pa tha dad do/ /chos nyid yin pas chos sku zhes/ /ba cig de skad 'dod pa yod/ /chos nyid rtogs dang chos ston pas/ /chos sku yin zhes 'dod pa'ang yod/ /nges pa bzhi ste 'khor dang ni/ /gnas dang ston ba chos su ste/ /des na ji ltar 'dod
446b2(mdo 'grel): pa ru/ /longs spyod byed pas longs spyod sku/ /'khor gyi nges pa sa bcu pa/ /'ba' zhig yin zhes seng bzang gsung/ /shAn+ti mthong lam yan chad kyi/ /byang chub sems dpa' yin zhes zer/ /gnas ni 'og min chos de ni/ /theg
446b3(mdo 'grel): pa chen po kho na'i chos/ /ston pa mtshan dang dpe byad kyis/ /brgyan pa'i gzugs ni kho na yin/ /mtshan ni sum cu rtsa gnyis dang/ /dpe byad brgyad cur bshad kyang de/ /dpag tu med par yod pa ste/ /rab gnas mtshon nas dpag med
446b4(mdo 'grel): bshad/ /gdul bya'i dor ni 'di tsam gyis/ /skyes bu chen po mtshon pas na/ /mtshan gyi mtshan nyid dag tu bshad/ /ngo bo spyir ni gzugs yin yang/ /phal du dbang po lnga la 'jog/ sems kyi rnam dag mtshon pas na/ /dpe byad zer
446b5(mdo 'grel): te yang na ni/ /mtshan ni brgyan par byed pas na/ /dpe byad du yang 'dod pa yod/ /sangs rgyas mtshan nyid ma yin kyang/ /ji ltar 'dul bar sprul bas na/ gzugs sku zhes ni brjod pa yin/ /nges pa bzhi dang bral nas su//
446b6(mdo 'grel): / ji lta ba dang de lta bur/ /ston pa sprul pI sku? yin no/ /de yi mjad pa nyi shu bdun/ /lhun gyis grub cing rgyun mi 'chad/ /'jig rten 'jig rten 'da' 'god dang/ /sangs rgyas la 'god rnam grol gsung/ /yang na ji lta/
446b7(mdo 'grel): pa? ji snyed pa/ /ji snyed rten dang lam bzhi 'god/ /mthar thug la 'god ji lta ba/ /bu d+d+hA? sh+rI dz+nyI na zer/ /de ltar mdzad pa dpag med kyang/ /lam bden rang bzhin gnas skabs te/ /mya ngan 'dos 'god 'bras bur
447a1(mdo 'grel): 'dod/ /lhun grub rgyun mi 'chad pa yang/ /thub pa kho na'i mdzad par bzhed/ /b+hi ga lar skyes dge slong ni/ /mar me mdzad dpal ye shes kyis/ /gzhung dang bla ma'i gsung gis na/ /phar ?
447a2(mdo 'grel): bsdus don sgron ma byas/ /de dge dri med gang thob bas/ /'gro kun log rtog rnam spangs te/ /pha rol phyin nyid rtogs nas kyang/ /gzhan la phan phyir ston par shog/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i don bsdus sgron ma zhes
447a3(mdo 'grel): bya ba/ /dpal mar me mdzad ye shes kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// //paN+Ti ta de nyid dang lo ts+tsha ba mkhas pa chen po tshul khrims rgyal bas bsgyur/ /slad kyis
447a4(mdo 'grel): dpal bsam yas lhun gyis grub pa'i rig pa 'byung ba'i gnas su/ /dI paM? kar shI dzra nas nyi khri bshad pa'i dus su 'di bshad par nas gton/ /phyis lo ban gnyis kyis bitpa? rta yid gsungs pas dag pa'i dper chung
447a5(mdo 'grel): ba'o/ /'di'i dpe phyi mo dang bitpa? rta dang rgyu dpe gsum mtshams phun/ /be ro tsa nas bsgyur ba'i 'bum sha sgro can gyi nad na yong do skad// //las kyi sgrib pa thams cad rnam par 'thag par byed pa'i
447a6(mdo 'grel): cho ga zhes bya ba sman bla'i sgrubs thabs zhugs so// //*/ /rgya gar skad du/ sarba karma A bar?/ bi shud+d+ha ka ra bid+hi/ /bod skad du/ las kyi sgrib pa thams cad rnam par 'thag par byed pa'i chog / rje btsun
447a7(mdo 'grel): sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bla ma'i zhal snga nas kyi bka' i gdams pas blo'i pad+ma kha bye ba/ snying rjes rgyud brlan zhing byang chub kyi sems brtan bas/ maN+Dal la sogs pa sngon du 'gro ba'i cho ga
447b1(mdo 'grel): byas la/ snying brtsa pa'i sems kyis rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi sems brtan por byas nas/ bsod nams kyi tshogs bsags par bya'o/ /oM a gA ro mu khaM sarba d+harmA NaM A dya nu tpan+na twa ta/ tshig gi don
447b2(mdo 'grel): rjes su dran pas ji tsam nus pas ngal gso par bya'o/ /dam bcas pa'i rjes su dran pas de nyid las ma bskyod bzhin du sems nyid sgra'i rtam par gyur pa la sogs pa gzugs kyi sku mngon par 'byung par 'gyur ro
447b3(mdo 'grel): / /sku mdog sngon po zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa/ a ru ra dad bdud rtsi'i lhung bzed bsnams/ /sems dpa' gnyis po ser dang dkar ba ste/ nyi ma zla ba cig shos 'dud par byed/ rnam par
447b4(mdo 'grel): dag pa'i cho ga rdzogs par byas la/ gzhan thams cad snying po byang chub la bzhag nas/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi chos kyi sku rjes? su dran pa brtan por bsgoms la/ bla ma dam pa'i zhal gyi gdams ngag
447b5(mdo 'grel): gi /oM? b+hai Sha? dze b+hai Sha dze ma hA b+hai Sha dze sa mung+ga? te swahA/ /zhes ji tsam nus pa bzlas la bcom ldan 'das mdun du bzhugs pa dang bstod pa bya ste/ /bcom ldan 'das rje btsun de nyid kyi smon lam chen
447b6(mdo 'grel): po bcu gnyis po lan cig brjod par bya'o/ /de'i rjes la rmi lam gyi shes pas dge pa'i las la 'bad par bya'o/ /thun mtshams su ji 'jigs la sogs pa'i gnod sbyin chen po bcu gnyis la gtod ma dbul
447b7(mdo 'grel): bar bya'o/ /gzhan yang thun mtshams su bcom ldan 'das de nyid kyi mdo'i po ti klag pa dang kha ton du gdon par bya'o/ /gal te las kyi sgrib pa shin tu chen mdo de nyid nas gsungs pa'i cho ga rdzogs par/
448a1(mdo 'grel): bya'o/ /las kyi sgrib pa thams cad rnam bar 'thag par byed pa'i cho ga/ slob dpon chen po dpal mar me mdzad pa
448a2(mdo 'grel): ye shes kyi zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //paN+Di ta de nyid dang lo tsA ba nag tsho tshul khrims rgyal bas bsgyur ba'o// //sarba mang+ga laM// //
